Ph.D. student in Linguistics at the [University of Freiburg](https://www.anglistik.uni-freiburg.de) doing quantitative psycholinguistic research on [individual differences in language processing](https://www.hpsl-linguistics.org/user/648/) and how big data can inform our understanding of real-time language processing.

Interests: Statistical data analysis with R, data science and general programming with Python, open & reproducible science, big data & human language comprehension, statistical education especially for women and underrepresented groups.
